education.degree: Master of Engineering in Systems and Technology (Automation and Smart Systems)
B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

experience.title: Business Analyst Co-op
details: Provided cybersecurity risk data and vulnerability updates from Tenable scans across 400+ endpoints, supporting budgeting and planning.
Automated patching and security tasks with 50+ PowerShell scripts deployed via Microsoft Intune, cutting remediation costs by 40%.
Developed Power BI dashboards to track vulnerability trends and patch compliance.
Managed planning documents and reports on SharePoint to align business data with IT security.
Delivered frontline Tech Bar support, resolving 100+ technical issues monthly.
Supported Windows 10 to 11 migration on 200+ devices.
Collaborated with Finance, IT, and Cybersecurity teams for regulatory reporting and compliance documentation.

projects.name: UCI Adult Income Prediction
projects.description: Built and tuned ML models (Logistic Regression, Decision Tree, SVM) on UCI Adult dataset to classify $50K+ earners, achieving 91% ROC-AUC.

projects.name: Object Detection Model Using Faster R-CNN
projects.description: Developed and optimized a Faster R-CNN object detection model using PyTorch on Pascal VOC 2012 dataset.

projects.name: Exploratory Data Analysis on Household Energy Consumption
projects.description: Performed EDA using Python to clean and visualize household energy usage patterns.

projects.name: Nifty 50 and Nifty Bank Time Series Prediction
projects.description: Built SARIMAX-based time series model to compare Nifty 50 and Nifty Bank performance with OHLC charts.
